name: Shift to Red
description:
Shift to Red is a Simple, Arcade, Score-based game about a Singularity trying to Rewind the Universe to the beginning of time. The player must outlast this for as long as possible by clicking on particles to redirect they away.

The longer you holdout, the higher your score!

Controls

  • Left Click - particles to redirect them
  • Left Click - when you're Score shows up to restart the game
  • Up Arrow Key - at the start of a new game, will increase the hp of the singularity, making it easier if you're struggling
  • Down Arrow Key - at the start of a new game, will decrease the hp until 1, making it harder if you want a challenge

Enjoy and if your want, please leave feedback. 

Sounds by bfxr.
